argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elom | |- ( A e. _om <-> ( A e. On /\ A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_limom | |- Lim _om |
| 3 |  | #P_omex | |- _om e. _V |
| 4 |  | #P_limeq | |- ( x = _om -> ( Lim x <-> Lim _om ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eleq2 | |- ( x = _om -> ( A e. x <-> A e. _om ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_imbi12d | |- ( x = _om -> ( ( Lim x -> A e. x ) <-> ( Lim _om -> A e. _om ) ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_spcv | |- ( A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) -> ( Lim _om -> A e. _om ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_mpi | |- ( A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) -> A e. _om ) |
| 9 |  | #P_nnon | |- ( A e. _om -> A e. On ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) -> A e. On ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_pm4.71ri | |- ( A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) <-> ( A e. On /\ A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( A e. _om <-> A. x ( Lim x -> A e. x ) ) |
